meanings: weighing, scaling, (비교·고찰하다) 저울질하다 weigh ((an argument)) with (another), compare ((A)) with (B)
(비교하다) compare (A with/to B), weigh (up) (A against B)

vlive.korean: 류주하랑 하민 사이에서 저울질하는 거짓말쟁이라고! You're a liar weighing between Ryu Jooha and Ha Min! 듣기 View video V HEARTBEAT - 2019 VLIVE AWARDS : [Full] 2019 VLIVE AWARDS V HEARTBEAT PART1
vlive.english: You're a liar weighing between Ryu Jooha and Ha Min!

vlive.korean: 너네집은 왜 그렇게 사람 저울질하냐고 막 얘기해, 안 참아도 된다고. Why does your family weigh people like that? You don't have to hold it in... 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [밥 잘 사주는 예쁜 누나 Voice Only #6]
vlive.english: Why does your family weigh people like that? You don't have to hold it in...

examples.korean: I weighed the benefits of the plan against the risks involved. 발음듣기 나는 그 계획의 이점을 관련되는 위험에 비추어 저울질해 보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I weighed the benefits of the plan against the risks involved. 발음

examples.korean: After weighing the pros and cons, he declined (to take) the job. 발음듣기 그는 득실을 저울질해 보고 그 일을 거절했다 Neungyule
examples.english: After weighing the pros and cons, he declined (to take) the job. 발음

examples.korean: I'm weighing three companies. 발음듣기 세 회사를 저울질하고 있어요. Neungyule
I weighed in my mind which option would be more beneficial to me. 발음듣기 나는 속으로 어느 쪽이 내게 더 이익일지 저울질했다 Neungyule
examples.english: I weighed in my mind which option would be more beneficial to me. 발음

examples.korean: The committee is weighing Mr. Huang's offer to testify in return for partial immunity from prosecution. 발음듣기 위원회는 부분적으로 기소를 면제해 준다는 조건으로 증언대에 나가겠다는 존 황의 제의를 신중히 저울질하고 있습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The committee is weighing Mr. Huang's offer to testify in return for partial immunity from prosecution. 발음
